line.dark: I should settle\ndown, but I don't\nknow if I want to.
line.light:
Getting married
sounds like a
good idea, but
should I?

line.dark: A new job offer\nwith a higher pay\ncame in the mail.
line.light: A new job offer\nwith a higher pay\ncame in the mail.

line.dark:
The company has a
good reputation,
but this isn't
the job that I want.
line.light: I don't think I'll\nlike the job, but\nit's from a good company.
